_sText:
Thank you for downloading Sumguy720's remake of DOOM 1's "The Hangar" for CSS.

This map was created entire from scratch by Philip Andresen (Sumguy720), however the level concept and original design is intellectually credited to John Romero, who created the level in DOOM 1.

The ingame music easter egg was created by TheGimpsta (http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/30494)

I would not recommend playing this map alone with bots, as the secret areas and doors confuse the hell out of them.


This is my first map, so I hope you all enjoy, I put a lot of work into it.


Installation:
Extract to:
C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\YourUserName
